name: Enhanced User Search
author: Shabnam

sections.description:
Enhanced User Search: Effortlessly Find Your Users
Struggling to locate specific users in your WordPress admin panel? The default search only allows filtering by username and email, making it cumbersome to find users with common names or if you don’t recall their exact login credentials.

Enhanced User Search simplifies user management by expanding the search capabilities. This plugin allows you to search for users by their first name, last name, username, or email address.

Here’s how Enhanced User Search streamlines your workflow:

Effortless User Identification: Quickly locate users with common names or those whose credentials you might not readily remember.
Improved Efficiency: Save time and frustration by searching based on any combination of user information.
Enhanced User Management: Gain greater control over your user base with a more comprehensive search functionality.

Key Features:

Search users by first name, last name, username, and email address.
Integrates seamlessly with the existing WordPress user search interface.
Lightweight and efficient, ensuring smooth performance on your website.
Easy to use – no configuration required, activates upon installation.

Benefits:

Save Time: Find the users you need faster with a more comprehensive search.
Improved Accuracy: Locate specific users with ease, reducing the risk of identifying the wrong person.
Enhanced User Management: Gain greater control over your user base.
Who should use Enhanced User Search?

This plugin is ideal for anyone who manages users in WordPress, especially those with:

Large User Bases: Easily find specific users even amidst a vast number of accounts.
Membership Sites: Efficiently manage user accounts for membership websites.
Multisite Networks: Effortlessly locate users across multiple sites in your network.
Enhanced User Search empowers you to manage your WordPress users with greater efficiency and ease. Download the plugin today and experience the difference!
sections.installation:
1. Visit the “Add New” page in the Plugins section.
  2. Choose “Upload Plugin.”
  3. Find and upload the zip file you downloaded, then hit “Install Now.”
  4. Activate the plugin by going to the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  5. That’s it! You’re all set up.

The plugin works automatically once activated. You can search for users by their first name, last name, username, or email address in the Users > Search Users section of your WordPress admin panel.

short_description: Effortlessly find users in WordPress! Search by first & last name, username, or email.
